description: Slice specifications for fairness and quality analysis

slices.description: English vs Bahasa Malaysia - ensure translation quality parity
slices.rationale: Malaysian users should get equal quality regardless of language
Recommendations should be merit-based, not brand-biased
Budget users deserve equally good advice
Core advice quality should not degrade by tier (features differ, not quality)
All use cases should be equally well-supported

notes: Parity threshold Δ ≤5% means no segment should be >5% worse than best segment
Example: If 'en' accuracy is 96% and 'ms' is 90%, parity Δ = 6% (FAIL)
Slice analysis runs automatically in eval runner
Violations trigger AMBER risk posture and executive review
